uws.job.serializer.filter

Class PhasesFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • uws.job.serializer.filter.PhasesFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobFilter

    public final class PhasesFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements JobFilter

    Job filter based on the execution phase. Only jobs that are in one of the execution phases listed in this filter are kept.

    The constructor of this filter requires exactly one execution phase. But obviously more phases can be added to the list of accepted execution phases by using the function add(ExecutionPhase).

    Since:
    4.2
    Version:
    4.2 (10/2015)
    Author:
    Grégory Mantelet (ARI)

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhasesFilter

        public PhasesFilter(ExecutionPhase phase)
             throws java.lang.NullPointerException

        Build a PhasesFilter which will retain only jobs in the given execution phase.

        More phases can be added into the list of accepted phases thanks to the function add(ExecutionPhase).

        Parameters:
        phase - An execution phase on which jobs to retain must be.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the given phase is NULL.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(ExecutionPhase phase)

        Add the given phase in the list of accepted phases.

        Note: The given phase is not added into the list if it is already inside.

        Parameters:
        phase - An execution phase to add inside the list of accepted phases.

      • match

        public boolean match(UWSJob job)
        Description copied from interface: JobFilter

        Tell whether the given job match this filter.

        Note: In case of error while evaluating this filter on the given job, false will be returned.

        Specified by:
        match in interface JobFilter
        Parameters:
        job - A job to filter.
        Returns:
        true if the job matches this filter, false otherwise.
